pr_title: ARTEMIS-3026 Allow "re-encode" of amqp large messages

timeline.message:
ARTEMIS-3026 Allow "re-encode" of amqp large messages

notice the quotes on "re-encode", as this is just replacing the set of application properties, properties and headers by a new set
if a flag reEncoded is set to true on AMQPLargeMessage

timeline.bodyText: Nit. Why is the E capitalised. Reencoded is a single word. https://en.m.wiktionary.org/wiki/reencoded
timeline.author: michaelandrepearce

timeline.bodyText: Why isnt the reencoding happening immediately like for other messages (amqp standard, core etc) and expected behaviour, e.g. other areas of code and plugins are expecting the message to rencoded by calling this without doing extra work. I can be missing something.
timeline.author: michaelandrepearce

replies.bodyText:
It would be fairly difficult to re-encode the message on the large message file.
For AMQP Large messages, I'm instead just flagging the message as re-encoded, and I would replace the stream during the delivery.
replies.author: clebertsuconic
